CustomField.description: If this is null, the item is a parent/aggregate. Otherwise should be populated with the DeveloperName of a parent To Do List Item so it is included in the parent's total and appears on its respective breakdown page
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is null, the item is a parent/aggregate. Otherwise should be populated with the DeveloperName of a parent To Do List Item so it is included in the parent's total and appears on its respective breakdown page
CustomField.label: Parent Item
